transcription.text: The Journey of Breath is a key element of Marshmallow Laser Feast’s Evolver, an immersive, large-scale installation that drops audiences deep inside the landscape of the body, to follow the flow of oxygen through our branching ecosystem to a single ‘breathing’ cell. Through this transcendental narrative, it becomes clear that breath not only sparks life but also connects us to the natural world through the cycle of respiration.

work.title: Evolver: The Journey of the Breath
